p: Inactivation of SARS-CoV-2 by formulated detergents is believed to occur as a result of disruption of the virally modified, host-cell-derived, phospholipid bilayer glycoproteinaceous envelope, and the associated spike glycoproteins interacting with the ACE2 receptor in the infection of host cells. Another mechanism of action entails raising the endocytic and lysosomal pH ( Hora et al., 2020).
